about.name: Cairo
about.info_text: Cairo is a bustling and historic city located in the heart of Egypt. Known for its ancient wonders, rich history, and vibrant culture, Cairo offers a blend of old-world charm and modern excitement. Visitors can explore iconic landmarks such as the Great Pyramid of Giza, experience the lively Khan El-Khalili bazaar, or visit world-class museums like the Egyptian Museum. Whether you're interested in history, culture, or delicious Egyptian cuisine, Cairo has something for everyone.
about.facts_text:
Population: 9.5 million
Governorate: Cairo
Time Zone: Eastern European Time (UTC+02:00)
Language: Arabic
Currency: Egyptian pound (EGP)
about.climate_text: Cairo has a hot desert climate with very little rainfall. Summers are scorching, with average temperatures reaching over 35°C (95°F), while winters are milder with daytime temperatures around 18-22°C (64-72°F). It's advisable to visit during the cooler months.

attractions_card.title: Giza Pyramids
attractions_card.description: The Great Pyramid of Giza is one of the most recognizable structures globally and the last surviving member of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Visitors can also explore the surrounding pyramids, the Sphinx, and ancient tombs.

attractions_card.title: Khan El-Khalili
attractions_card.description: This bustling bazaar in Islamic Cairo dates back to the 14th century and is a popular destination for shopping and people watching. Visitors can browse for souvenirs, sip tea at a café, or take a walking tour of the area.

attractions_card.title: Egyptian Museum
attractions_card.description: Home to one of the world's most extensive collections of ancient Egyptian artifacts, the Egyptian Museum in Cairo is a must-visit for history buffs. Highlights include the Tutankhamun exhibit and the mummy room.

attractions_card.title: Cairo Citadel
attractions_card.description: Perched atop a hill in Islamic Cairo, the Cairo Citadel is a UNESCO World Heritage site and a prime example of Islamic military architecture. Visitors can explore the fortifications, mosques, and museums within the citadel walls.

food_card.title: Koshari
food_card.description: Koshari is a popular Egyptian dish made with rice, lentils, and pasta, topped with a spicy tomato sauce and crispy fried onions. You can try it at local eateries like El Tahrir Koshari in Downtown Cairo or Abu Tarek in Midan Tahrir.

food_card.title: Foul
food_card.description: Foul is a hearty and filling breakfast dish made with fava beans, served with bread and optional toppings like tahini, onions, and tomatoes. You can try it at Foul El Gamal in Islamic Cairo or at Foul El Mahshi in Zamalek.

food_card.title: Karkadeh
food_card.description: Karkadeh is a refreshing hibiscus tea that's popular in Egypt. You can find it at many cafes and restaurants throughout Cairo, or try making it yourself with dried hibiscus flowers.

hotels_card.alt: Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza
hotels_card.title: Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza
hotels_card.description: This luxurious hotel is located on the banks of the Nile River and offers stunning views of the city. Amenities include an outdoor pool, spa, and multiple dining options.

hotels_card.title: Kempinski Nile Hotel Cairo
hotels_card.description: This five-star hotel is situated in the Garden City district and offers spacious rooms and suites with modern amenities. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa, fitness center, and several dining options.

hotels_card.alt: Cairo Marriott Hotel & Omar Khayyam Casino
hotels_card.title: Cairo Marriott Hotel & Omar Khayyam Casino
hotels_card.description: This historic hotel is located in Zamalek and offers elegant rooms and suites with views of the Nile or the hotel's gardens. Amenities include a casino, spa, and several restaurants.

transport_card.title: Metro
transport_card.description: The Cairo Metro is the fastest and most convenient way to get around the city. It has three lines that connect many of the major attractions, and tickets can be purchased at stations.

transport_card.title: Uber
transport_card.description: Uber is available in Cairo and can be ordered directly from the app.
